LanguageData.StandardizedExtrusions.PipeDescription: A pneumatic tube capable of transporting standardized extrusions of {0}
LanguageData.StandardizedExtrusions.SubPipeDescriptio: A subterranean pneumatic tube capable of transporting standardized extrusions of {0}
LanguageData.StandardizedExtrusions.VatDescription: A {0} storage container capable of storing {1} standardized units of {2}
LanguageData.StandardizedExtrusions.ExtractResourceDe: Extract 75 units from the storage container
LanguageData.StandardizedExtrusions.DrainDescription: A hopper-like storage basin mean1t to input {0} into the network, filling up connected storage containers
LanguageData.StandardizedExtrusions.TapDescription: A hopper-like storage basin meant to hold dispensed {0} from storage containers periodically for use later
LanguageData.StandardizedExtrusions.ColdTapDescriptio: A refrigerated hopper-like storage basin meant to hold dispensed {0} from storage containers periodically for use later
LanguageData.StandardizedExtrusions.PerCategoryResear: Build pneumatic tubes that may be used to transport materials in the {0} category to where they need to go.
LanguageData.StandardizedExtrusions.PipeSystem_Augmen: Augment output maximum stack size by 100.
Augment output maximum stack size by 1000.
LanguageData.StandardizedExtrusions.PipeSystem_Decrea: Decrease output maximum stack size by 100.
Decrease output maximum stack size by 1000.
LanguageData.StandardizedExtrusions.EnableCategory_De: If true, allows pneumatic tube network to be created from things in this category.
LanguageData.StandardizedExtrusions.EnableThing_Title: Allow {0} assuming category is enabled (change requires reload)
LanguageData.StandardizedExtrusions.EnableThing_Descr: If false, pneumatic tube networka will not be created for this thing.
